articles.title: WhatsApp’s impossible choice: three reasons why the app will be badly hit by the Telecom Bill - Economic Times
articles.description: The draft Telecom Bill that came out a couple of weeks ago had been at the centre of a privacy storm. For Indias most popular messaging service, the bill in its current form is an existential issue.
